                • info.ryandorman.simplescheduler.common.DatePickerInput
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, javafx.scene.control.Skinnable
    public class DatePickerInput
extends javafx.scene.control.DatePicker
    Improves javafx.scene.control.DatePicker to ensures user text input causes the proper value updates.

    • Field Summary

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private void setPickerValueBasedOnInput()
      Makes sure the value set via text input by user results in the javafx.scene.control.DatePicker's value being updated.
      void setRestrictBusinessDays()
      Sets dates available for selection in the javafx.scene.control.DatePicker window to only weekdays in the present and future.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DatePickerInput

        public DatePickerInput()
        Setups overrides on default javafx.scene.control.DatePicker behavior.

    • Method Detail

      • setRestrictBusinessDays

        public void setRestrictBusinessDays()
        Sets dates available for selection in the javafx.scene.control.DatePicker window to only weekdays in the present and future. A Lambda is used to easily set up the javafx.util.Callback that overrides DateCell::updateItem

      • setPickerValueBasedOnInput

        private void setPickerValueBasedOnInput()
        Makes sure the value set via text input by user results in the javafx.scene.control.DatePicker's value being updated. The default javafx.scene.control.DatePicker behavior does not accomplish this reliably.
